ml.classifier.dt
Class Estimator

java.lang.Object
  ml.classifier.dt.Estimator

public class Estimator
extends java.lang.Object

An estimator specifically used to estimate extra error ratio for c4.5's error-based pruning strategy.

Author:
Ping He, Xiaohua Xu
See Also:
DecisionTree.prune()

getExtraError

public static float getExtraError(float totalWeight,
                                  float leafError)
Estimate the extra error ratio for the specified basic error ratio of the data.
Transplanted from Quinlan's c4.5(Release 8).

Parameters:
totalWeight - the total weight of data distributed on the tree node.
leafError - the leaf error of the tree node when considered as a leaf node.
Returns:
The estimated extra error ratio of the data.
